After U Have Installed It (Clonedvd) 

GOTO >RUN > "regedit" (Type It) Find The Game
Look For Something Similar Like "Ubisoft"

Double Click On It And And Find "Lang" (Could Be Similar 2 This)

Change It To "ENG" (Orignally It Will Be "RUS") 

*If The Above Doesnt Work
